posts.title: Day 1: Getting Started with React
posts.body: Today, I learned how to set up a React project using Vite.

posts.title: Day 2: Components and JSX
posts.body: Created my first functional components and used JSX.

posts.title: Day 3: Props and State
posts.body: Explored how props and state work in React.

posts.title: Day 4: Handling Events
posts.body: Practiced event handlers like onClick and onChange.

posts.title: Day 5: Conditional Rendering
posts.body: Learned how to show/hide elements using conditions.

posts.title: Day 6: Lists and Keys
posts.body: Rendered lists using map() and handled keys properly.

posts.title: Day 7: Forms in React
posts.body: Built controlled forms with input fields and submit handlers.

posts.title: Day 8: useEffect Hook
posts.body: Used useEffect to run side effects and fetch data.

posts.title: Day 9: Custom Hooks
posts.body: Created reusable logic using custom hooks.

posts.title: Day 10: Context API
posts.body: Used React Context to manage global state.

posts.title: Day 11: React Router
posts.body: Implemented navigation using React Router DOM.

posts.title: Day 12: Axios + API Calls
posts.body: Fetched data using Axios and handled loading and error states.

posts.title: Day 13: React Query
posts.body: Used React Query for caching and auto-refetching data.

posts.title: Day 14: Material UI / Tailwind
posts.body: Integrated UI libraries for styling the app.

posts.title: Day 15: Authentication
posts.body: Learned how to implement login and private routes.

posts.title: Day 16: CRUD Operations
posts.body: Implemented create, read, update, delete for posts.

posts.title: Day 17: Deployment
posts.body: Deployed the app using Vercel and checked performance.

posts.title: Day 18: Code Splitting
posts.body: Improved performance using lazy loading and suspense.

posts.title: Day 19: Error Boundaries
posts.body: Handled unexpected runtime errors gracefully.

posts.title: Day 20: Final Review
posts.body: Reviewed everything and prepared documentation.

posts.title: Day 21: Performance Optimization
posts.body: Learned how to memoize components and avoid unnecessary re-renders.

posts.title: Day 22: React Profiler
posts.body: Used React DevTools Profiler to analyze component performance.

posts.title: Day 23: TypeScript with React
posts.body: Started using TypeScript to add types and interfaces to components.

posts.title: Day 24: Advanced Hooks
posts.body: Explored useReducer and useLayoutEffect for complex state logic.

posts.title: Day 25: Recoil for State Management
posts.body: Tried Recoil as an alternative to Redux and Context.

posts.title: Day 26: React + Firebase
posts.body: Integrated Firebase for authentication and real-time database.

posts.title: Day 27: Server Components
posts.body: Experimented with React Server Components for SSR.

posts.title: Day 28: CSS-in-JS
posts.body: Used styled-components and Emotion for scoped styling.

posts.title: Day 29: Testing with Jest
posts.body: Wrote unit tests for components using Jest and React Testing Library.

posts.title: Day 30: End-to-End Testing
posts.body: Performed E2E testing with Cypress for full user flows.

posts.title: Day 31: Real-time Chat App
posts.body: Built a chat app using Socket.IO with React frontend.

posts.title: Day 32: Dark Mode Toggle
posts.body: Implemented light/dark mode with Tailwind and localStorage.

posts.title: Day 33: Progressive Web App (PWA)
posts.body: Converted app into a PWA with offline capabilities.

posts.title: Day 34: File Upload Feature
posts.body: Added image/file upload with preview functionality.

posts.title: Day 35: Infinite Scroll
posts.body: Implemented infinite scrolling using Intersection Observer.

posts.title: Day 36: Drag and Drop
posts.body: Created draggable UI elements using react-beautiful-dnd.

posts.title: Day 37: Multi-language Support
posts.body: Added i18n support for multiple languages using react-i18next.

posts.title: Day 38: Payment Integration
posts.body: Integrated Stripe for handling payments in the app.

posts.title: Day 39: Admin Dashboard
posts.body: Built a dashboard for admins with charts and analytics.

posts.title: Day 40: Portfolio Showcase
posts.body: Showcased the entire project as part of my developer portfolio.
